Package CardModel

Class actionCard

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
GameView.card
CardModel.actionCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
cardInterface, unoConstants, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class actionCard
extends card
The actionCard class serves as an UNO "card" of TYPE: ACTION. This class will be implemented to identify action cards from other card types.
See Also:
